creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a little girl in a dress with a hibiscus flower print wearing heart-shaped sunglasses, standing in front of two teenagers lying in a hammock facing each other
signed: on back on applied piece of paper in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Julia with Teens in a Hammock
